    • getJustification

      public Clause getJustification(PositiveAtom fact)
      Description copied from interface: EvalManagerWithProvenance
      Return the last rule used in the justification of the given atom. The returned rule should be ground (variable-free). Return null if the given atom is not a fact or was not derived.
      Specified by:
      getJustification in interface EvalManagerWithProvenance
      Parameters:
      fact - the fact
      Returns:
      the last rule used to justify that fact
